directions: In a mixing bowl, mash the cottage cheese with a fork until it is smooth and creamy.
Combine the clams, sour cream, onion, salt, lemon juice, clam juice and pepper with the cottage cheese. Refrigerate the mixture and allow it to chill for 30 minutes, or until it thickens.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) can minced clams, drained with juice reserved
title: Cottage Cheese Clam Dip
